posts.post_content: I prefer this over story circle Zirilan. I mean, it requires no colored mana at all, while just playing story circle and activating it once requires 3 white mana. Also, the story circle can't stop colorless damage, or damage from a source of a color different than the one you chose. Sure, story circle is great, but I like this one more.

rather large mox jet  
i actually use [story circle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=story circle) instead of this card

-unfortunately you only get to choose 1 colour :(

posts.post_content:
Arguably the best OOP from A/B/U that isn't Power 9  
(well, excepting the once again ridiculous [Time Vault](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Vault)).  
  
This is an \*awesome\* card in a control or mill deck-  
it can save your ass while you collect what you need to win.
posts.html:

it can save your ass while you collect what you need to win.
